snippet: The leader of the xenophobic British National Party spent part of Monday encouraging his supporters to support President Bashar al-Assad in online discussion forums read by American voters.
abstract: The leader of the xenophobic British National Party spent part of Monday encouraging his supporters to support President Bashar al-Assad in online discussion forums read by American voters.

headline.main: Ultranationalist Britons Wage Online Battle for Assad
